Definition at line 1644 of file test_operators.cpp.

1644 {
1645
1646 PREPARE_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr, refVec, refMatr );
1647
1648 SECTION( "correctness" ) {
1649
1650 // try every kind of binary encoding
1651 enum bitEncoding encoding = GENERATE( UNSIGNED,TWOS_COMPLEMENT );
1652
1653 // try every possible number of registers
1654 // (between #qubits containing 1, and 1 containing #qubits)
1655 int numRegs;
1656 int maxNumRegs = 0;
1657 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
1658 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS;
1659 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1660 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS/2; // floors
1661 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( range(1, maxNumRegs+1) );
1662
1663 // try every possible total number of involved qubits
1664 int totalNumQubits;
1665 int minTotalQubits = 0;
1666 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
1667 // each register must contain at least 1 qubit
1668 minTotalQubits = numRegs;
1669 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1670 // each register must contain at least 2 qubits
1671 minTotalQubits = 2*numRegs;
1672 totalNumQubits = GENERATE_COPY( range(minTotalQubits,NUM_QUBITS+1) );
1673
1674 // try every qubits subset and ordering
1675 int* regs = GENERATE_COPY( sublists(range(0,NUM_QUBITS), totalNumQubits) );
1676
1677 // assign each sub-reg its minimum length
1678 int unallocQubits = totalNumQubits;
1679 VLA(int, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs);
1680 for (int i=0; i<numRegs; i++)
1681 if (encoding == UNSIGNED) {
1682 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 1;
1683 unallocQubits -= 1;
1684 }
1685 else if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT) {
1686 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 2;
1687 unallocQubits -= 2;
1688 }
1689 // and randomly allocate the remaining qubits between the registers
1690 while (unallocQubits > 0) {
1691 numQubitsPerReg[getRandomInt(0,numRegs)] += 1;
1692 unallocQubits--;
1693 }
1694
1695
1696 // choose a random number of overrides (even overriding every amplitude)
1697 int numOverrides = getRandomInt(0, (1<<totalNumQubits) + 1);
1698
1699 // randomise each override index (uniqueness isn't checked)
1700 VLA(long long int, overrideInds, numOverrides*numRegs);
1701 int flatInd = 0;
1702 for (int v=0; v<numOverrides; v++) {
1703 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++) {
1704 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
1705 overrideInds[flatInd] = getRandomInt(0, 1<<numQubitsPerReg[r]);
1706 else if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1707 overrideInds[flatInd] = getRandomInt(-(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[r]-1)), (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[r]-1))-1);
1708 flatInd++;
1709 }
1710 }
1711
1712 // override to a random phase
1713 VLA(qreal, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1714 for (int v=0; v<numOverrides; v++)
1715 overridePhases[v] = getRandomReal(-4, 4); // periodic in [-pi, pi]
1716
1717
1718 // determine the values corresponding to each register for all basis states
1719 std::vector<std::vector<qreal>> regVals(1<<totalNumQubits, std::vector<qreal>(numRegs));
1720 for (long long int i=0; i<(1<<totalNumQubits); i++) {
1721
1722 long long int bits = i;
1723 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++) {
1724 regVals[i][r] = bits % (1 << numQubitsPerReg[r]);
1725 bits = bits >> numQubitsPerReg[r];
1726
1727 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1728 regVals[i][r] = getTwosComplement(regVals[i][r], numQubitsPerReg[r]);
1729 }
1730 }
1731
1732 /* a reference diagonal matrix which assumes the qubits are
1733 * contiguous and strictly increasing between the registers, and hence
1734 * only depends on the number of qubits in each register.
1735 */
1736 QMatrix diagMatr = getZeroMatrix(1 << totalNumQubits);
1737
1738 SECTION( "NORM" ) {
1739
1740 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
1741 qreal phase = 0;
1742 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
1743 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
1744 phase = sqrt(phase);
1745 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
1746 }
1747 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1748
1749 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
1750
1751 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1752 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1753 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
1754 }
1755 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
1756
1757 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1758 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1759 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E4*REAL_EPS) );
1760 }
1761 }
1762 SECTION( "PRODUCT" ) {
1763
1764 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
1765 qreal phase = 1;
1766 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
1767 phase *= regVals[i][r];
1768 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
1769 }
1770
1771 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1772
1773 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
1774
1775 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, PRODUCT, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1776 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1777 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
1778 }
1779 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
1780
1781 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, PRODUCT, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1782 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1783 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E4*REAL_EPS) );
1784 }
1785 }
1786 SECTION( "DISTANCE" ) {
1787
1788 // test only if there are an even number of registers
1789 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
1790
1791 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
1792 qreal phase = 0;
1793 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
1794 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
1795 phase = sqrt(phase);
1796 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
1797 }
1798
1799 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1800 }
1801
1802 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
1803
1804 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
1805 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, DISTANCE, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1806 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1807 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
1808 }
1809 }
1810 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
1811
1812 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
1813 applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, DISTANCE, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
1814 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
1815 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E4*REAL_EPS) );
1816 }
1817 }
1818 }
1819 }
1820 SECTION( "input validation" ) {
1821
1822 int numRegs = 2;
1823 int numQubitsPerReg[] = {2,3};
1824 int regs[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
1825
1826 SECTION( "number of registers" ) {
1827
1828 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( -1, 0, 1+MAX_NUM_REGS_APPLY_ARBITRARY_PHASE );
1829 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubit subregisters") );
1830 }
1831 SECTION( "number of qubits" ) {
1832
1833 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = GENERATE( -1, 0, 1+NUM_QUBITS );
1834 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubits") );
1835 }
1836 SECTION( "repetition of qubits" ) {
1837
1838 regs[GENERATE(2,3,4)] = regs[1];
1839 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("The qubits must be unique") );
1840 }
1841 SECTION( "qubit indices" ) {
1842
1843 regs[GENERATE(range(0,NUM_QUBITS))] = GENERATE( -1, NUM_QUBITS );
1844 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid qubit index") );
1845 }
1846 SECTION( "bit encoding name" ) {
1847
1848 enum bitEncoding enc = (enum bitEncoding) GENERATE( -1, 2 );
1849 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid bit encoding") );
1850 }
1851 SECTION( "two's complement register" ) {
1852
1853 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = 1;
1854 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, TWOS_COMPLEMENT, NORM, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("A sub-register contained too few qubits to employ TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
1855 }
1856 SECTION( "phase function name" ) {
1857
1858 enum phaseFunc func = (enum phaseFunc) GENERATE( -1, MAX_INDEX_PHASE_FUNC + 1 );
1859 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid named phase function") );
1860 }
1861 SECTION( "phase function parameters" ) {
1862
1863 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( SCALED_NORM, INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM, SCALED_PRODUCT, INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_DISTANCE, INVERSE_DISTANCE, SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE, SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE );
1864 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
1865 }
1866 SECTION( "distance pair registers" ) {
1867
1868 int numQb[] = {1,1,1,1,1};
1869 int qb[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
1870
1871 numRegs = GENERATE( 1, 3, 5 );
1872 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, qb, numQb, numRegs, UNSIGNED, DISTANCE, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Phase functions DISTANCE") && Contains("even number of sub-registers") );
1873 }
1874 SECTION( "number of overrides" ) {
1875
1876 int numOverrides = -1;
1877 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, NULL, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid number of phase function overrides specified") );
1878 }
1879 SECTION( "override indices" ) {
1880
1881 // numQubitsPerReg = {2, 3}
1882 int numOverrides = 3;
1883 long long int overrideInds[] = {0,0, 0,0, 0,0}; // repetition not checked
1884 qreal overridePhases[] = {.1, .1, .1};
1885
1886 // first element of overrideInds coordinate is a 2 qubit register
1887 enum bitEncoding enc = UNSIGNED;
1888 int badInd = GENERATE(0, 2, 4);
1889 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE( -1, (1<<2) );
1890 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the UNSIGNED encoding") );
1891 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
1892
1893 // second element of overrideInds coordinate is a 3 qubit register
1894 badInd += 1;
1895 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE( -1, (1<<3) );
1896 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the UNSIGNED encoding") );
1897 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
1898 badInd -= 1;
1899
1900 enc = TWOS_COMPLEMENT;
1901 int minInd = -(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[0]-1));
1902 int maxInd = (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[0]-1)) - 1;
1903 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE_COPY( minInd-1, maxInd+1 );
1904 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
1905 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
1906
1907 badInd++;
1908 minInd = -(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[1]-1));
1909 maxInd = (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[1]-1)) -1;
1910 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE_COPY( minInd-1, maxInd+1 );
1911 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
1912 }
1913 }
1914 CLEANUP_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr );
1915}
applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides
void applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(Qureg qureg, int *qubits, int *numQubitsPerReg, int numRegs, enum bitEncoding encoding, enum phaseFunc functionNameCode, long long int *overrideInds, qreal *overridePhases, int numOverrides)
Induces a phase change upon each amplitude of qureg, determined by a named (and potentially multi-var...
Definition: QuEST.c:821

References applyNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(), applyReferenceOp(), areEqual(), CLEANUP_TEST, DISTANCE, expI(), getRandomInt(), getRandomReal(), getTwosComplement(), getZeroMatrix(), INVERSE_DISTANCE, INVERSE_NORM, INVERSE_PRODUCT, MAX_INDEX_PHASE_FUNC, MAX_NUM_REGS_APPLY_ARBITRARY_PHASE, NORM, NUM_QUBITS, PREPARE_TEST, PRODUCT, qreal, SCALED_DISTANCE, SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE, SCALED_INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE, SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM, SCALED_NORM, SCALED_PRODUCT, setDiagMatrixOverrides(), sublists(), TWOS_COMPLEMENT, UNSIGNED, and VLA.

◆ TEST_CASE() [14/136]

TEST_CASE ( "applyParamNamedPhaseFunc"  ,
""  [operators] 
)
See also
applyParamNamedPhaseFunc
Author
Tyson Jones

Definition at line 1923 of file test_operators.cpp.

1923 {
1924
1925 PREPARE_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr, refVec, refMatr );
1926
1927 SECTION( "correctness" ) {
1928
1929 // try every kind of binary encoding
1930 enum bitEncoding encoding = GENERATE( UNSIGNED,TWOS_COMPLEMENT );
1931
1932 // try every possible number of registers
1933 // (between #qubits containing 1, and 1 containing #qubits)
1934 int numRegs;
1935 int maxNumRegs = 0;
1936 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
1937 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS;
1938 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1939 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS/2; // floors
1940 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( range(1, maxNumRegs+1) );
1941
1942 // try every possible total number of involved qubits
1943 int totalNumQubits;
1944 int minTotalQubits = 0;
1945 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
1946 // each register must contain at least 1 qubit
1947 minTotalQubits = numRegs;
1948 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1949 // each register must contain at least 2 qubits
1950 minTotalQubits = 2*numRegs;
1951 totalNumQubits = GENERATE_COPY( range(minTotalQubits,NUM_QUBITS+1) );
1952
1953 // Previously, we would try every qubits subset and ordering, via:
1954 // int* regs = GENERATE_COPY( sublists(range(0,NUM_QUBITS), totalNumQubits) );
1955 // Alas, this is too many tests and times out Ubuntu unit testing. So instead, we
1956 // randomly choose some qubits, 10 times.
1957 GENERATE( range(0, 10) );
1958 VLA(int, regs, totalNumQubits);
1959 setRandomTargets(regs, totalNumQubits, NUM_QUBITS);
1960
1961 // assign each sub-reg its minimum length
1962 int unallocQubits = totalNumQubits;
1963 VLA(int, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs);
1964 for (int i=0; i<numRegs; i++)
1965 if (encoding == UNSIGNED) {
1966 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 1;
1967 unallocQubits -= 1;
1968 }
1969 else if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT) {
1970 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 2;
1971 unallocQubits -= 2;
1972 }
1973 // and randomly allocate the remaining qubits between the registers
1974 while (unallocQubits > 0) {
1975 numQubitsPerReg[getRandomInt(0,numRegs)] += 1;
1976 unallocQubits--;
1977 }
1978
1979 /* produce a reference diagonal matrix which assumes the qubits are
1980 * contiguous and strictly increasing between the registers, and hence
1981 * only depends on the number of qubits in each register.
1982 */
1983 QMatrix diagMatr = getZeroMatrix(1 << totalNumQubits);
1984
1985 // determine the values corresponding to each register for all basis states
1986 std::vector<std::vector<qreal>> regVals(1<<totalNumQubits, std::vector<qreal>(numRegs));
1987 for (long long int i=0; i<(1<<totalNumQubits); i++) {
1988
1989 long long int bits = i;
1990 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++) {
1991 regVals[i][r] = bits % (1 << numQubitsPerReg[r]);
1992 bits = bits >> numQubitsPerReg[r];
1993
1994 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
1995 regVals[i][r] = getTwosComplement(regVals[i][r], numQubitsPerReg[r]);
1996 }
1997 }
1998
1999 SECTION( "INVERSE_NORM" ) {
2000
2001 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_NORM;
2002 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2003
2004 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2005 qreal phase = 0;
2006 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2007 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2008 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1/sqrt(phase);
2009 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2010 }
2011
2012 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2013 int numParams = 1;
2014
2015 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2016
2017 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2018 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2019 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2020 }
2021 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2022
2023 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2024 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2025 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2026 }
2027
2028 }
2029 SECTION( "SCALED_NORM" ) {
2030
2031 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_NORM;
2032 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2033
2034 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2035 qreal phase = 0;
2036 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2037 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2038 phase = coeff * sqrt(phase);
2039 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2040 }
2041
2042 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2043 int numParams = 1;
2044
2045 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2046
2047 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2048 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2049 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2050 }
2051 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2052
2053 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2054 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2055 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2056 }
2057 }
2058 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_NORM" ) {
2059
2060 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_NORM;
2061 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2062 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2063
2064 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2065 qreal phase = 0;
2066 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2067 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2068 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : coeff/sqrt(phase);
2069 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2070 }
2071
2072 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2073 int numParams = 2;
2074
2075 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2076
2077 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2078 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2079 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2080 }
2081 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2082
2083 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2084 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2085 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2086 }
2087 }
2088 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM" ) {
2089
2090 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM;
2091 int numParams = 2 + numRegs;
2092 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2093 params[0] = getRandomReal(-10, 10); // scaling
2094 params[1] = getRandomReal(-4, 4); // divergence override
2095 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2096 params[2+r] = getRandomReal(-8, 8); // shifts
2097
2098 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2099 qreal phase = 0;
2100 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2101 phase += pow(regVals[i][r] - params[2+r], 2);
2102 phase = sqrt(phase);
2103 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2104 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2105 }
2106
2107 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2108
2109 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2110 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2111 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2112 }
2113 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2114
2115 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2116 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2117 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2118 }
2119 }
2120 SECTION( "INVERSE_PRODUCT" ) {
2121
2122 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_PRODUCT;
2123 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2124
2125 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2126 qreal phase = 1;
2127 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2128 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2129 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1. / phase;
2130 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2131 }
2132
2133 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2134 int numParams = 1;
2135
2136 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2137
2138 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2139 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2140 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2141 }
2142 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2143
2144 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2145 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2146 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2147 }
2148 }
2149 SECTION( "SCALED_PRODUCT" ) {
2150
2151 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_PRODUCT;
2152 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2153
2154 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2155 qreal phase = 1;
2156 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2157 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2158 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(coeff * phase);
2159 }
2160
2161 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2162 int numParams = 1;
2163
2164 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2165
2166 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2167 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2168 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2169 }
2170 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2171
2172 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2173 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2174 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2175 }
2176 }
2177 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT" ) {
2178
2179 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT;
2180 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2181 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2182 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2183 int numParams = 2;
2184
2185 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2186 qreal phase = 1;
2187 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2188 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2189 phase = (phase == 0)? divPhase : coeff / phase;
2190 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2191 }
2192
2193 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2194
2195 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2196 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2197 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2198 }
2199 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2200
2201 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2202 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2203 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2204 }
2205 }
2206 SECTION( "INVERSE_DISTANCE" ) {
2207
2208 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_DISTANCE;
2209 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal( -4, 4 );
2210 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2211 int numParams = 1;
2212
2213 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2214 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2215
2216 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2217 qreal phase = 0;
2218 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2219 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2220 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1./sqrt(phase);
2221 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2222 }
2223 }
2224
2225 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2226
2227 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2228 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2229 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2230 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2231 }
2232 }
2233 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2234
2235 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2236 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2237 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2238 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2239 }
2240 }
2241 }
2242 SECTION( "SCALED_DISTANCE" ) {
2243
2244 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_DISTANCE;
2245 qreal coeff = getRandomReal( -10, 10 );
2246 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2247 int numParams = 1;
2248
2249 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2250 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2251
2252 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2253 qreal phase = 0;
2254 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2255 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2256 phase = coeff * sqrt(phase);
2257 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2258 }
2259 }
2260
2261 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2262
2263 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2264 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2265 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2266 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2267 }
2268 }
2269 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2270
2271 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2272 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2273 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2274 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2275 }
2276 }
2277 }
2278 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE" ) {
2279
2280 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE;
2281 qreal coeff = getRandomReal( -10, 10 );
2282 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal( -4, 4 );
2283 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2284 int numParams = 2;
2285
2286 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2287 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2288
2289 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2290 qreal phase = 0;
2291 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2292 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2293 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : coeff/sqrt(phase);
2294 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2295 }
2296 }
2297
2298 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2299
2300 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2301 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2302 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2303 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2304 }
2305 }
2306 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2307
2308 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2309 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2310 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2311 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2312 }
2313 }
2314 }
2315 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE" ) {
2316
2317 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE;
2318 int numParams = 2 + numRegs/2;
2319 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2320
2321 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2322 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2323
2324 params[0] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // scaling
2325 params[1] = getRandomReal( -4, 4 ); // divergence override
2326 for (int r=0; r<numRegs/2; r++)
2327 params[2+r] = getRandomReal( -8, 8 ); // shifts
2328
2329 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2330 qreal phase = 0;
2331 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2332 phase += pow(regVals[i][r]-regVals[i][r+1]-params[2+r/2], 2);
2333 phase = sqrt(phase);
2334 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2335 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2336 }
2337 }
2338
2339 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2340
2341 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2342 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2343 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2344 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2345 }
2346 }
2347 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2348
2349 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2350 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2351 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2352 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2353 }
2354 }
2355 }
2356 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE" ) {
2357
2358 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE;
2359 int numParams = 2 + numRegs;
2360 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2361
2362 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2363 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2364
2365 params[0] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // scaling
2366 params[1] = getRandomReal( -4, 4 ); // divergence override
2367 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2) {
2368 params[2+r] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // factor
2369 params[2+r+1] = getRandomReal( -8, 8 ); // shift
2370 }
2371
2372 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2373 qreal phase = 0;
2374 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2375 phase += params[2+r] * pow(regVals[i][r]-regVals[i][r+1]-params[2+r+1], 2);
2376 if (phase < 0)
2377 phase = 0;
2378 phase = sqrt(phase);
2379 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2380 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2381 }
2382 }
2383
2384 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2385
2386 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2387 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2388 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2389 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2390 }
2391 }
2392 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2393
2394 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2395 applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams);
2396 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2397 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E4*REAL_EPS) );
2398 }
2399 }
2400 }
2401 }
2402 SECTION( "input validation" ) {
2403
2404 int numRegs = 2;
2405 int numQubitsPerReg[] = {2,3};
2406 int regs[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
2407
2408 SECTION( "number of registers" ) {
2409
2410 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( -1, 0, 1+MAX_NUM_REGS_APPLY_ARBITRARY_PHASE );
2411 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubit subregisters") );
2412 }
2413 SECTION( "number of qubits" ) {
2414
2415 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = GENERATE( -1, 0, 1+NUM_QUBITS );
2416 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubits") );
2417 }
2418 SECTION( "repetition of qubits" ) {
2419
2420 regs[GENERATE(2,3,4)] = regs[1];
2421 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("The qubits must be unique") );
2422 }
2423 SECTION( "qubit indices" ) {
2424
2425 regs[GENERATE(range(0,NUM_QUBITS))] = GENERATE( -1, NUM_QUBITS );
2426 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid qubit index") );
2427 }
2428 SECTION( "bit encoding name" ) {
2429
2430 enum bitEncoding enc = (enum bitEncoding) GENERATE( -1, 2 );
2431 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid bit encoding") );
2432 }
2433 SECTION( "two's complement register" ) {
2434
2435 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = 1;
2436 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, TWOS_COMPLEMENT, NORM, NULL, 0), Contains("A sub-register contained too few qubits to employ TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
2437 }
2438 SECTION( "phase function name" ) {
2439
2440 enum phaseFunc func = (enum phaseFunc) GENERATE( -1, MAX_INDEX_PHASE_FUNC + 1 );
2441 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid named phase function") );
2442 }
2443 SECTION( "phase function parameters" ) {
2444
2445 VLA(qreal, params, numRegs + 3);
2446 for (int r=0; r<numRegs + 3; r++)
2447 params[r] = 0;
2448
2449 SECTION( "no parameter functions" ) {
2450
2451 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( NORM, PRODUCT, DISTANCE );
2452 int numParams = GENERATE( -1, 1, 2 );
2453 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2454 }
2455 SECTION( "single parameter functions" ) {
2456
2457 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( SCALED_NORM, INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_PRODUCT, INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_DISTANCE, INVERSE_DISTANCE );
2458 int numParams = GENERATE( -1, 0, 2 );
2459 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2460 }
2461 SECTION( "two parameter functions" ) {
2462
2463 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( SCALED_INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE );
2464 int numParams = GENERATE( 0, 1, 3 );
2465 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2466 }
2467 SECTION( "shifted distance" ) {
2468
2469 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2470 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE;
2471 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, numRegs/2 - 1, numRegs/2, numRegs/2 + 1, numRegs/2 + 3 );
2472 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2473 }
2474 }
2475 SECTION( "shifted norm" ) {
2476
2477 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM;
2478 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, numRegs-1, numRegs, numRegs+1, numRegs+3 );
2479 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2480 }
2481 SECTION( "shifted weighted distance" ) {
2482
2483 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2484 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE;
2485 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, 2 + numRegs - 1, 2 + numRegs + 1 );
2486 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
2487 }
2488 }
2489 }
2490 SECTION( "distance pair registers" ) {
2491
2492 int numQb[] = {1,1,1,1,1};
2493 int qb[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
2494
2495 numRegs = GENERATE( 1, 3, 5 );
2496 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(quregVec, qb, numQb, numRegs, UNSIGNED, DISTANCE, NULL, 0), Contains("Phase functions DISTANCE") && Contains("even number of sub-registers") );
2497 }
2498 }
2499 CLEANUP_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr );
2500}
applyParamNamedPhaseFunc
void applyParamNamedPhaseFunc(Qureg qureg, int *qubits, int *numQubitsPerReg, int numRegs, enum bitEncoding encoding, enum phaseFunc functionNameCode, qreal *params, int numParams)
Induces a phase change upon each amplitude of qureg, determined by a named, paramaterized (and potent...
Definition: QuEST.c:839
setRandomTargets
void setRandomTargets(int *targs, int numTargs, int numQb)
Populates targs with a random selection of numTargs elements from [0,numQb-1].

SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE
@ SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE
Definition: QuEST.h:235

◆ TEST_CASE() [15/136]

TEST_CASE ( "applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides"  ,
""  [operators] 
)
See also
applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides
Author
Tyson Jones

Definition at line 2508 of file test_operators.cpp.

2508 {
2509
2510 PREPARE_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr, refVec, refMatr );
2511
2512 SECTION( "correctness" ) {
2513
2514 // try every kind of binary encoding
2515 enum bitEncoding encoding = GENERATE( UNSIGNED,TWOS_COMPLEMENT );
2516
2517 // try every possible number of registers
2518 // (between #qubits containing 1, and 1 containing #qubits)
2519 int numRegs;
2520 int maxNumRegs = 0;
2521 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
2522 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS;
2523 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
2524 maxNumRegs = NUM_QUBITS/2; // floors
2525 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( range(1, maxNumRegs+1) );
2526
2527 // try every possible total number of involved qubits
2528 int totalNumQubits;
2529 int minTotalQubits = 0;
2530 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
2531 // each register must contain at least 1 qubit
2532 minTotalQubits = numRegs;
2533 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
2534 // each register must contain at least 2 qubits
2535 minTotalQubits = 2*numRegs;
2536 totalNumQubits = GENERATE_COPY( range(minTotalQubits,NUM_QUBITS+1) );
2537
2538 // Previously, we would try every qubits subset and ordering, via:
2539 // int* regs = GENERATE_COPY( sublists(range(0,NUM_QUBITS), totalNumQubits) );
2540 // Alas, this is too many tests and times out Ubuntu unit testing. So instead, we
2541 // randomly choose some qubits, 10 times.
2542 GENERATE( range(0, 10) );
2543 VLA(int, regs, totalNumQubits);
2544 setRandomTargets(regs, totalNumQubits, NUM_QUBITS);
2545
2546 // assign each sub-reg its minimum length
2547 int unallocQubits = totalNumQubits;
2548 VLA(int, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs);
2549 for (int i=0; i<numRegs; i++)
2550 if (encoding == UNSIGNED) {
2551 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 1;
2552 unallocQubits -= 1;
2553 }
2554 else if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT) {
2555 numQubitsPerReg[i] = 2;
2556 unallocQubits -= 2;
2557 }
2558 // and randomly allocate the remaining qubits between the registers
2559 while (unallocQubits > 0) {
2560 numQubitsPerReg[getRandomInt(0,numRegs)] += 1;
2561 unallocQubits--;
2562 }
2563
2564
2565 // choose a random number of overrides (even overriding every amplitude)
2566 int numOverrides = getRandomInt(0, (1<<totalNumQubits) + 1);
2567
2568 // randomise each override index (uniqueness isn't checked)
2569 VLA(long long int, overrideInds, numOverrides*numRegs);
2570 int flatInd = 0;
2571 for (int v=0; v<numOverrides; v++) {
2572 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++) {
2573 if (encoding == UNSIGNED)
2574 overrideInds[flatInd] = getRandomInt(0, 1<<numQubitsPerReg[r]);
2575 else if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
2576 overrideInds[flatInd] = getRandomInt(-(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[r]-1)), (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[r]-1))-1);
2577 flatInd++;
2578 }
2579 }
2580
2581 // override to a random phase
2582 VLA(qreal, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2583 for (int v=0; v<numOverrides; v++)
2584 overridePhases[v] = getRandomReal(-4, 4); // periodic in [-pi, pi]
2585
2586
2587 // determine the values corresponding to each register for all basis states
2588 std::vector<std::vector<qreal>> regVals(1<<totalNumQubits, std::vector<qreal>(numRegs));
2589 for (long long int i=0; i<(1<<totalNumQubits); i++) {
2590
2591 long long int bits = i;
2592 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++) {
2593 regVals[i][r] = bits % (1 << numQubitsPerReg[r]);
2594 bits = bits >> numQubitsPerReg[r];
2595
2596 if (encoding == TWOS_COMPLEMENT)
2597 regVals[i][r] = getTwosComplement(regVals[i][r], numQubitsPerReg[r]);
2598 }
2599 }
2600
2601 /* produce a reference diagonal matrix which assumes the qubits are
2602 * contiguous and strictly increasing between the registers, and hence
2603 * only depends on the number of qubits in each register.
2604 */
2605 QMatrix diagMatr = getZeroMatrix(1 << totalNumQubits);
2606
2607
2608 SECTION( "INVERSE_NORM" ) {
2609
2610 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_NORM;
2611 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2612 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2613 int numParams = 1;
2614
2615 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2616 qreal phase = 0;
2617 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2618 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2619 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1/sqrt(phase);
2620 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2621 }
2622 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2623
2624 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2625
2626 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2627 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2628 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2629 }
2630 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2631
2632 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2633 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2634 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2635 }
2636 }
2637 SECTION( "SCALED_NORM" ) {
2638
2639 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_NORM;
2640 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2641 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2642 int numParams = 1;
2643
2644 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2645 qreal phase = 0;
2646 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2647 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2648 phase = coeff * sqrt(phase);
2649 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2650 }
2651 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2652
2653 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2654
2655 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2656 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2657 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2658 }
2659 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2660
2661 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2662 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2663 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2664 }
2665 }
2666 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_NORM" ) {
2667
2668 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_NORM;
2669 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2670 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2671 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2672 int numParams = 2;
2673
2674 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2675 qreal phase = 0;
2676 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2677 phase += pow(regVals[i][r], 2);
2678 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : coeff/sqrt(phase);
2679 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2680 }
2681 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2682
2683 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2684
2685 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2686 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2687 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2688 }
2689 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2690
2691 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2692 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2693 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2694 }
2695 }
2696 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM" ) {
2697
2698 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM;
2699 int numParams = 2 + numRegs;
2700 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2701 params[0] = getRandomReal(-10, 10); // scaling
2702 params[1] = getRandomReal(-4, 4); // divergence override
2703 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2704 params[2+r] = getRandomReal(-8, 8); // shifts
2705
2706 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2707 qreal phase = 0;
2708 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2709 phase += pow(regVals[i][r] - params[2+r], 2);
2710 phase = sqrt(phase);
2711 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2712 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2713 }
2714 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2715
2716 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2717
2718 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2719 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2720 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2721 }
2722 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2723
2724 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2725 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2726 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2727 }
2728 }
2729 SECTION( "INVERSE_PRODUCT" ) {
2730
2731 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_PRODUCT;
2732 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2733 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2734 int numParams = 1;
2735
2736 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2737 qreal phase = 1;
2738 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2739 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2740 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1. / phase;
2741 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2742 }
2743 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2744
2745 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2746
2747 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2748 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2749 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2750 }
2751 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2752
2753 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2754 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2755 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2756 }
2757 }
2758 SECTION( "SCALED_PRODUCT" ) {
2759
2760 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_PRODUCT;
2761 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2762 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2763 int numParams = 1;
2764
2765 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2766 qreal phase = 1;
2767 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2768 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2769 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(coeff * phase);
2770 }
2771 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2772
2773 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2774
2775 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2776 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2777 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2778 }
2779 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2780
2781 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2782 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2783 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2784 }
2785 }
2786 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT" ) {
2787
2788 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT;
2789 qreal coeff = getRandomReal(-10, 10);
2790 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal(-4, 4);
2791 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2792 int numParams = 2;
2793
2794 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2795 qreal phase = 1;
2796 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r++)
2797 phase *= regVals[i][r];
2798 phase = (phase == 0)? divPhase : coeff / phase;
2799 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2800 }
2801 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2802
2803 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2804
2805 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2806 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2807 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2808 }
2809 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2810
2811 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2812 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2813 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2814 }
2815 }
2816 SECTION( "INVERSE_DISTANCE" ) {
2817
2818 enum phaseFunc func = INVERSE_DISTANCE;
2819 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal( -4, 4 );
2820 qreal params[] = {divPhase};
2821 int numParams = 1;
2822
2823 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2824 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2825
2826 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2827 qreal phase = 0;
2828 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2829 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2830 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : 1./sqrt(phase);
2831 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2832 }
2833 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2834 }
2835
2836 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2837
2838 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2839 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2840 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2841 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2842 }
2843 }
2844 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2845
2846 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2847 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2848 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2849 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2850 }
2851 }
2852 }
2853 SECTION( "SCALED_DISTANCE" ) {
2854
2855 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_DISTANCE;
2856 qreal coeff = getRandomReal( -10, 10 );
2857 qreal params[] = {coeff};
2858 int numParams = 1;
2859
2860 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2861 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2862
2863 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2864 qreal phase = 0;
2865 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2866 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2867 phase = coeff * sqrt(phase);
2868 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2869 }
2870 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2871 }
2872
2873 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2874
2875 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2876 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2877 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2878 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2879 }
2880 }
2881 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2882
2883 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2884 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2885 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2886 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2887 }
2888 }
2889 }
2890 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE" ) {
2891
2892 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE;
2893 qreal coeff = getRandomReal( -10, 10 );
2894 qreal divPhase = getRandomReal( -4, 4 );
2895 qreal params[] = {coeff, divPhase};
2896 int numParams = 2;
2897
2898 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2899 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2900
2901 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2902 qreal phase = 0;
2903 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2904 phase += pow(regVals[i][r+1]-regVals[i][r], 2);
2905 phase = (phase == 0.)? divPhase : coeff/sqrt(phase);
2906 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2907 }
2908 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2909 }
2910
2911 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2912
2913 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2914 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2915 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2916 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2917 }
2918 }
2919 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2920
2921 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2922 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2923 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2924 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2925 }
2926 }
2927 }
2928 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE" ) {
2929
2930 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE;
2931 int numParams = 2 + numRegs/2;
2932 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2933
2934 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2935 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2936
2937 params[0] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // scaling
2938 params[1] = getRandomReal( -4, 4 ); // divergence override
2939 for (int r=0; r<numRegs/2; r++)
2940 params[2+r] = getRandomReal( -8, 8 ); // shifts
2941
2942 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2943 qreal phase = 0;
2944 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2945 phase += pow(regVals[i][r]-regVals[i][r+1]-params[2+r/2], 2);
2946 phase = sqrt(phase);
2947 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2948 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2949 }
2950
2951 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2952 }
2953
2954 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
2955
2956 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2957 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2958 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2959 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2960 }
2961 }
2962 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
2963
2964 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2965 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2966 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
2967 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
2968 }
2969 }
2970 }
2971 SECTION( "SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE" ) {
2972
2973 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE;
2974 int numParams = 2 + numRegs;
2975 VLA(qreal, params, numParams);
2976
2977 // test only if there are an even number of registers
2978 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
2979
2980 params[0] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // scaling
2981 params[1] = getRandomReal( -4, 4 ); // divergence override
2982 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2) {
2983 params[2+r] = getRandomReal( -10, 10 ); // factor
2984 params[2+r+1] = getRandomReal( -8, 8 ); // shift
2985 }
2986
2987 for (size_t i=0; i<diagMatr.size(); i++) {
2988 qreal phase = 0;
2989 for (int r=0; r<numRegs; r+=2)
2990 phase += params[2+r] * pow(regVals[i][r]-regVals[i][r+1]-params[2+r+1], 2);
2991 if (phase < 0)
2992 phase = 0;
2993 phase = sqrt(phase);
2994 phase = (phase <= REAL_EPS)? params[1] : params[0]/phase;
2995 diagMatr[i][i] = expI(phase);
2996 }
2997
2998 setDiagMatrixOverrides(diagMatr, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
2999 }
3000
3001 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
3002
3003 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
3004 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
3005 applyReferenceOp(refVec, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
3006 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregVec, refVec, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
3007 }
3008 }
3009 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
3010
3011 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
3012 applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregMatr, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, encoding, func, params, numParams, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides);
3013 applyReferenceOp(refMatr, regs, totalNumQubits, diagMatr);
3014 REQUIRE( areEqual(quregMatr, refMatr, 1E4*REAL_EPS) );
3015 }
3016 }
3017 }
3018 }
3019 SECTION( "input validation" ) {
3020
3021 int numRegs = 2;
3022 int numQubitsPerReg[] = {2,3};
3023 int regs[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
3024
3025 SECTION( "number of registers" ) {
3026
3027 numRegs = GENERATE_COPY( -1, 0, 1+MAX_NUM_REGS_APPLY_ARBITRARY_PHASE );
3028 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubit subregisters") );
3029 }
3030 SECTION( "number of qubits" ) {
3031
3032 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = GENERATE( -1, 0, 1+NUM_QUBITS );
3033 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of qubits") );
3034 }
3035 SECTION( "repetition of qubits" ) {
3036
3037 regs[GENERATE(2,3,4)] = regs[1];
3038 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("The qubits must be unique") );
3039 }
3040 SECTION( "qubit indices" ) {
3041
3042 regs[GENERATE(range(0,NUM_QUBITS))] = GENERATE( -1, NUM_QUBITS );
3043 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid qubit index") );
3044 }
3045 SECTION( "bit encoding name" ) {
3046
3047 enum bitEncoding enc = (enum bitEncoding) GENERATE( -1, 2 );
3048 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid bit encoding") );
3049 }
3050 SECTION( "two's complement register" ) {
3051
3052 numQubitsPerReg[GENERATE_COPY(range(0,numRegs))] = 1;
3053 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, TWOS_COMPLEMENT, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("A sub-register contained too few qubits to employ TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
3054 }
3055 SECTION( "phase function name" ) {
3056
3057 enum phaseFunc func = (enum phaseFunc) GENERATE( -1, MAX_INDEX_PHASE_FUNC + 1 );
3058 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid named phase function") );
3059 }
3060 SECTION( "phase function parameters" ) {
3061
3062 VLA(qreal, params, numRegs + 3);
3063 for (int r=0; r<numRegs + 3; r++)
3064 params[r] = 0;
3065
3066 SECTION( "no parameter functions" ) {
3067
3068 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( NORM, PRODUCT, DISTANCE );
3069 int numParams = GENERATE( -1, 1, 2 );
3070 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3071 }
3072 SECTION( "single parameter functions" ) {
3073
3074 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( SCALED_NORM, INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_PRODUCT, INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_DISTANCE, INVERSE_DISTANCE );
3075 int numParams = GENERATE( -1, 0, 2 );
3076 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3077 }
3078 SECTION( "two parameter functions" ) {
3079
3080 enum phaseFunc func = GENERATE( SCALED_INVERSE_NORM, SCALED_INVERSE_PRODUCT, SCALED_INVERSE_DISTANCE );
3081 int numParams = GENERATE( 0, 1, 3 );
3082 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3083 }
3084 SECTION( "shifted distance" ) {
3085
3086 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
3087 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_DISTANCE;
3088 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, numRegs/2 - 1, numRegs/2, numRegs/2 + 1, numRegs/2 + 3 );
3089 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3090 }
3091 }
3092 SECTION( "shifted weighted distance" ) {
3093
3094 if (numRegs%2 == 0) {
3095 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_WEIGHTED_DISTANCE;
3096 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, 2 + numRegs - 1, 2 + numRegs + 1 );
3097 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3098 }
3099 }
3100 SECTION( "shifted norm" ) {
3101
3102 enum phaseFunc func = SCALED_INVERSE_SHIFTED_NORM;
3103 int numParams = GENERATE_COPY( 0, 1, numRegs-1, numRegs, numRegs+1, numRegs+3 );
3104 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, func, params, numParams, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Invalid number of parameters") );
3105 }
3106 }
3107 SECTION( "distance pair registers" ) {
3108
3109 int numQb[] = {1,1,1,1,1};
3110 int qb[] = {0,1,2,3,4};
3111
3112 numRegs = GENERATE( 1, 3, 5 );
3113 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, qb, numQb, numRegs, UNSIGNED, DISTANCE, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, 0), Contains("Phase functions DISTANCE") && Contains("even number of sub-registers") );
3114 }
3115 SECTION( "number of overrides" ) {
3116
3117 int numOverrides = -1;
3118 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, UNSIGNED, NORM, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid number of phase function overrides specified") );
3119 }
3120 SECTION( "override indices" ) {
3121
3122 // numQubitsPerReg = {2, 3}
3123 int numOverrides = 3;
3124 long long int overrideInds[] = {0,0, 0,0, 0,0}; // repetition not checked
3125 qreal overridePhases[] = {.1, .1, .1};
3126
3127 // first element of overrideInds coordinate is a 2 qubit register
3128 enum bitEncoding enc = UNSIGNED;
3129 int badInd = GENERATE(0, 2, 4);
3130 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE( -1, (1<<2) );
3131 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the UNSIGNED encoding") );
3132 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
3133
3134 // second element of overrideInds coordinate is a 3 qubit register
3135 badInd += 1;
3136 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE( -1, (1<<3) );
3137 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the UNSIGNED encoding") );
3138 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
3139 badInd -= 1;
3140
3141 enc = TWOS_COMPLEMENT;
3142 int minInd = -(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[0]-1));
3143 int maxInd = (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[0]-1)) - 1;
3144 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE_COPY( minInd-1, maxInd+1 );
3145 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
3146 overrideInds[badInd] = 0;
3147
3148 badInd++;
3149 minInd = -(1<<(numQubitsPerReg[1]-1));
3150 maxInd = (1<<(numQubitsPerReg[1]-1)) -1;
3151 overrideInds[badInd] = GENERATE_COPY( minInd-1, maxInd+1 );
3152 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyParamNamedPhaseFuncOverrides(quregVec, regs, numQubitsPerReg, numRegs, enc, NORM, NULL, 0, overrideInds, overridePhases, numOverrides), Contains("Invalid phase function override index, in the TWOS_COMPLEMENT encoding") );
3153 }
3154 }
3155 CLEANUP_TEST( quregVec, quregMatr );
3156}

3164 {
3165
3166 Qureg vecIn = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3167 Qureg vecOut = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3168 Qureg matIn = createDensityQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3169 Qureg matOut = createDensityQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3170
3171 initDebugState(vecIn);
3172 initDebugState(matIn);
3173
3174 SECTION( "correctness" ) {
3175
3176 /* it's too expensive to try every possible Pauli configuration, so
3177 * we'll try 10 random codes, and for each, random coefficients
3178 */
3179 GENERATE( range(0,10) );
3180
3181 int numTerms = GENERATE( 1, 2, 10, 15 );
3182 PauliHamil hamil = createPauliHamil(NUM_QUBITS, numTerms);
3183 setRandomPauliSum(hamil);
3184 QMatrix refHamil = toQMatrix(hamil);
3185
3186 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
3187
3188 QVector vecRef = toQVector(vecIn);
3189 applyPauliHamil(vecIn, hamil, vecOut);
3190
3191 // ensure vecIn barely changes under precision
3192 REQUIRE( areEqual(vecIn, vecRef) );
3193
3194 // ensure vecOut changed correctly
3195 REQUIRE( areEqual(vecOut, refHamil * vecRef) );
3196 }
3197 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
3198
3199 QMatrix matRef = toQMatrix(matIn);
3200 applyPauliHamil(matIn, hamil, matOut);
3201
3202 // ensure matIn barely changes under precision
3203 REQUIRE( areEqual(matIn, matRef) );
3204
3205 // ensure matOut changed correctly
3206 REQUIRE( areEqual(matOut, refHamil * matRef, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
3207 }
3208
3209 destroyPauliHamil(hamil);
3210 }
3211 SECTION( "input validation" ) {
3212
3213 SECTION( "pauli codes" ) {
3214
3215 int numTerms = 3;
3216 PauliHamil hamil = createPauliHamil(NUM_QUBITS, numTerms);
3217
3218 // make one pauli code wrong
3219 hamil.pauliCodes[GENERATE_COPY( range(0,numTerms*NUM_QUBITS) )] = (pauliOpType) GENERATE( -1, 4 );
3220 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliHamil(vecIn, hamil, vecOut), Contains("Invalid Pauli code") );
3221
3222 destroyPauliHamil(hamil);
3223 }
3224 SECTION( "qureg dimensions" ) {
3225
3226 Qureg badVec = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS+1, QUEST_ENV);
3227 PauliHamil hamil = createPauliHamil(NUM_QUBITS, 1);
3228
3229 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliHamil(vecIn, hamil, badVec), Contains("Dimensions of the qubit registers don't match") );
3230
3231 destroyQureg(badVec, QUEST_ENV);
3232 destroyPauliHamil(hamil);
3233 }
3234 SECTION( "qureg types" ) {
3235
3236 PauliHamil hamil = createPauliHamil(NUM_QUBITS, 1);
3237
3238 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliHamil(vecIn, hamil, matOut), Contains("Registers must both be state-vectors or both be density matrices") );
3239
3240 destroyPauliHamil(hamil);
3241 }
3242 SECTION( "matching hamiltonian qubits" ) {
3243
3244 PauliHamil hamil = createPauliHamil(NUM_QUBITS + 1, 1);
3245
3246 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliHamil(vecIn, hamil, vecOut), Contains("same number of qubits") );
3247 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliHamil(matIn, hamil, matOut), Contains("same number of qubits") );
3248
3249 destroyPauliHamil(hamil);
3250 }
3251 }
3252 destroyQureg(vecIn, QUEST_ENV);
3253 destroyQureg(vecOut, QUEST_ENV);
3254 destroyQureg(matIn, QUEST_ENV);
3255 destroyQureg(matOut, QUEST_ENV);

TEST_CASE ( "applyPauliSum"  ,
""  [operators] 
)
See also
applyPauliSum
Author
Tyson Jones

Definition at line 3264 of file test_operators.cpp.

3264 {
3265
3266 Qureg vecIn = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3267 Qureg vecOut = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3268 Qureg matIn = createDensityQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3269 Qureg matOut = createDensityQureg(NUM_QUBITS, QUEST_ENV);
3270
3271 initDebugState(vecIn);
3272 initDebugState(matIn);
3273
3274 SECTION( "correctness" ) {
3275
3276 /* it's too expensive to try ALL Pauli sequences, via
3277 * pauliOpType* paulis = GENERATE_COPY( pauliseqs(numPaulis) );.
3278 * Furthermore, take(10, pauliseqs(numTargs)) will try the same pauli codes.
3279 * Hence, we instead opt to repeatedly randomly generate pauliseqs
3280 */
3281 GENERATE( range(0,10) ); // gen 10 random pauli-codes
3282
3283 int numTerms = GENERATE( 1, 2, 10, 15);
3284 int numPaulis = numTerms * NUM_QUBITS;
3285
3286 // each test will use random coefficients
3287 VLA(qreal, coeffs, numTerms);
3288 VLA(pauliOpType, paulis, numPaulis);
3289 setRandomPauliSum(coeffs, paulis, NUM_QUBITS, numTerms);
3290 QMatrix pauliSum = toQMatrix(coeffs, paulis, NUM_QUBITS, numTerms);
3291
3292 SECTION( "state-vector" ) {
3293
3294 QVector vecRef = toQVector(vecIn);
3295 applyPauliSum(vecIn, paulis, coeffs, numTerms, vecOut);
3296
3297 // ensure vecIn barely changes under precision
3298 REQUIRE( areEqual(vecIn, vecRef) );
3299
3300 // ensure vecOut changed correctly
3301 REQUIRE( areEqual(vecOut, pauliSum * vecRef) );
3302 }
3303 SECTION( "density-matrix" ) {
3304
3305 QMatrix matRef = toQMatrix(matIn);
3306 applyPauliSum(matIn, paulis, coeffs, numTerms, matOut);
3307
3308 // ensure matIn barely changes under precision
3309 REQUIRE( areEqual(matIn, matRef) );
3310
3311 // ensure matOut changed correctly
3312 REQUIRE( areEqual(matOut, pauliSum * matRef, 1E2*REAL_EPS) );
3313 }
3314 }
3315 SECTION( "input validation" ) {
3316
3317 SECTION( "number of terms" ) {
3318
3319 int numTerms = GENERATE( -1, 0 );
3320 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliSum(vecIn, NULL, NULL, numTerms, vecOut), Contains("Invalid number of terms") );
3321 }
3322 SECTION( "pauli codes" ) {
3323
3324 // valid codes
3325 int numTerms = 3;
3326 int numPaulis = numTerms*NUM_QUBITS;
3327 VLA(pauliOpType, paulis, numPaulis);
3328 for (int i=0; i<numPaulis; i++)
3329 paulis[i] = PAULI_I;
3330
3331 // make one invalid
3332 paulis[GENERATE_COPY( range(0,numPaulis) )] = (pauliOpType) GENERATE( -1, 4 );
3333 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliSum(vecIn, paulis, NULL, numTerms, vecOut), Contains("Invalid Pauli code") );
3334 }
3335 SECTION( "qureg dimensions" ) {
3336
3337 Qureg badVec = createQureg(NUM_QUBITS+1, QUEST_ENV);
3338 pauliOpType paulis[NUM_QUBITS];
3339 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliSum(vecIn, paulis, NULL, 1, badVec), Contains("Dimensions of the qubit registers don't match") );
3340 destroyQureg(badVec, QUEST_ENV);
3341 }
3342 SECTION( "qureg types" ) {
3343
3344 pauliOpType paulis[NUM_QUBITS];
3345 REQUIRE_THROWS_WITH( applyPauliSum(vecIn, paulis, NULL, 1, matOut), Contains("Registers must both be state-vectors or both be density matrices") );
3346 }
3347 }
3348 destroyQureg(vecIn, QUEST_ENV);
3349 destroyQureg(vecOut, QUEST_ENV);
3350 destroyQureg(matIn, QUEST_ENV);
3351 destroyQureg(matOut, QUEST_ENV);
3352}
